column4: How do I delete a swap partition? I'm reinstalling ubuntu...says it's protected

ahh maybe liive cd is using swap
it must be used right now Or did you have home directory encryption?

put sudo infront of the command you are using

type mount    in a terminal see if its mounted
no idea then.  Are you sure you're trying to delete a swap on the actuall hdd.

yes i'm sure...hdd is the only one in sequence
